text: 10 years ago while a student here at
Harvard Business School my Brother Avi
Kramer was diagnosed with
Alis in the following years this cruel
and devastating disease strapped him of
every physical ability AI is now
completely paralyzed unable to speak and
is fed by a tube directly to his stomach
this is what ALS does to to patients but
now the Harvard Business School class of
2016 is joining their fight by taking
the ALS Ice Bucket Challenge despite
being sick AV graduated and with Harvard
Business School classmates founded price
for Life a nonprofit dedicated to
finding a cure to ALS our donations will
support this
organization the Harvard Business School
class of 2016 would like to pass the
challenge to the following schools MIT
Sloan Harvard Medical School and Harvard
Law School you have one week
Ai and every LS patient out there this
is for
you
[Applause]
w
